sn11.16:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying near Rājagaha, on the Vulture’s Peak Mountain.
sn11.16:1.2: And then Sakka, lord of gods, went up to the Buddha, bowed, stood to one side,
sn11.16:2.4: where is a gift very fruitful?”
sn11.16:3.2: and four established in the fruit.
sn11.16:4.4: what is given to the Saṅgha is very fruitful.”
